mutants.code:
def min_operations_to_reverse_string(S: str) -> int:
    old_s = list(S)
    r = old_s[::-1]
    i = 1
    j = 0
    n = len(old_s)
    while j < n:
        if old_s[j] == r[i]:
            i += 1
        j += 1
    return n - i
